channel.title: Someone needs teh help
channel.description:
Internet problem :( Basically I left my computer on one day while I was at school, when I return home I try and go to a forum using mozzilla firefox, I get the error www.whatever can not be found, please check the name and try again. Still doesn’t work so I try some other forums I wanted to go to, none working.. Then I try goggle that works. Strange. Then I go to this website Runescape that also works, it’s a game and from the website you choose different ‘worlds’ (servers) to play from, only some of the servers work.. Other pages can not be displayed. Very strange. Then I try some other websites out, its not just forums that don’t work, some websites also work. I can’t see any relationship between the websites that work and the ones that don’t. Then I try using internet explorer.. Some pages do and don’t work. Sometimes this one website I keep using does work; sometimes it doesn’t, so this is really confusing. Then I try using vent.. Most servers don’t work, one did and im sure there would be more if I tried connecting to others. Online games such as guild wars and jedi knight work no problem. However today jedi knight stopped working, perhaps it’s a virus or something that’s causing the problem and blocking things I like to use? I have tried restarting my router and computer of course... I’ve had this problem for a few days now. The Jedi knight not working is making me seek some help lol. I’ve ran virus scans and things.. I have around 157 things which I have to remove personally says Norton… it takes a long time and I usually leave them so it’s probably not them. I always disable my Norton professional firewall to use the internet and ive turned windows firewall off… A lot of people are suggesting firewall issues. I can’t really think of the cause of all this. Any help is greatly appreciated; it’s most likely I need a friend to post on any forums this goes on because I probably can’t visit it. Cheers. ~~Dolfin.
I don't know what's going on. I'll relay the answers back to him.

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Does he have permission from the router for everything? If he has a router, that is.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

Did he try rebooting? Sometimes when I encounter weird problems, simply rebooting usually fixes it.

Read full topic

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @Taylor Taylor
item.description:
@Taylor wrote:

is his drivers installed correctly?

Read full topic

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @therealjdb JDB`
item.description:
@therealjdb wrote:

Then why not use one of those ones? I don’t know at first I thought it might have been a bad connection(wireless?) or ISP related but if its only that one computer then I’d have to say that I’m clueless and hopefully its something software related and not hardware so that it will be an easy fix

Read full topic

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Well, he says it’s only on his computer. The other one’s in his house work fine.

Read full topic

maybe the server’s firewall banned him like mopar’s firewall banned me by accident

item.title: Someone needs teh help
item.dc:creator: @Pwnd Pwnd
item.description:
@Pwnd wrote:

Internet problem :(

Basically I left my computer on one day while I was at school, when I return home I try and go to a forum using mozzilla firefox, I get the error www.whatever can not be found, please check the name and try again. Still doesn’t work so I try some other forums I wanted to go to, none working… Then I try goggle that works. Strange. Then I go to this website Runescape that also works, it’s a game and from the website you choose different ‘worlds’ (servers) to play from, only some of the servers work… Other pages can not be displayed. Very strange.

Then I try some other websites out, its not just forums that don’t work, some websites also work. I can’t see any relationship between the websites that work and the ones that don’t.

Then I try using internet explorer… Some pages do and don’t work. Sometimes this one website I keep using does work; sometimes it doesn’t, so this is really confusing.

Then I try using vent… Most servers don’t work, one did and im sure there would be more if I tried connecting to others.

Online games such as guild wars and jedi knight work no problem. However today jedi knight stopped working, perhaps it’s a virus or something that’s causing the problem and blocking things I like to use?

I have tried restarting my router and computer of course… I’ve had this problem for a few days now. The Jedi knight not working is making me seek some help lol.

I’ve ran virus scans and things… I have around 157 things which I have to remove personally says Norton… it takes a long time and I usually leave them so it’s probably not them.

I always disable my Norton professional firewall to use the internet and ive turned windows firewall off… A lot of people are suggesting firewall issues.

I can’t really think of the cause of all this.

Any help is greatly appreciated; it’s most likely I need a friend to post on any forums this goes on because I probably can’t visit it.

Cheers.

~~Dolfin.


I don’t know what’s going on.

I’ll relay the answers back to him.

Read full topic
